Relative Strength Index (RSI) is flashing warning signals. RSI is a momentum oscillator used to evaluate overbought or oversold conditions in the price of a stock or cryptocurrency.

articles.title: Trump signs law to create regulatory regime for stablecoins, a huge win for crypto backers

articles.summary: Trump signed a law to create a regulatory regime for U.S.-dollar-pegged cryptocurrencies known as stablecoins. Stablecoins are designed to maintain a constant value, usually a 1:1 dollar peg. The industry hopes they will enter mainstream use for sending and receiving payments instantly.

articles.title: Tourists told to stop shoving coins into rocks at Giant's Causeway

Visitors have been placing coins in the cracks between the rocks as a sign of love or luck. The coins rapidly corrode and expand, causing the basalt to flake and leaving rust-coloured streaks. Stone masons recently removed as many coins as they could without causing further damage.

articles.title: House Passes Stablecoin Bill, Sends It to Trump's Desk
articles.summary: After a rocky start to 'Crypto Week', House Republicans move forward with the Genius Act. House lawmakers passed a stablecoin bill on July 17 in a vote of 308â122, sending it to President Donald Trump's desk for his signature. The lower chamber rejected a key procedural vote on setting terms for the bill's floor debate on July 15, with 13 Republicans siding with Democrats. House Speaker Mike Johnson faced opposition from GOP lawmakers, including Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-Ga.), who wanted to combine the bill with two other cryptocurrency-related bills.
